title: nox
content:

So did you like it ?
I am the bad you are the ugly There is no good

No, I've never played Nox. Please give us more information about the game--which genre does it fall under, when was it released, what platform does it play on, etc?

Also, capitalization is your friend. If you can take the time to capitalize properly in the signature you're stamping on every single post you make, you can take the time to learn to use your SHIFT key. Thanks. :-)

title: Re: ...
content:
Back then everybody compared it to Diable, and it's not hard to see why.
I tried a demo, I think multiplayer only, and got bored soon, although I admit I didn't give it much more than a few minutes, so don't take it into consideration at all. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
Diable never really suited me, so I suppose Nox doesn't either.
